item.title: FeeaSim
item.description: FeeaSim is a railway simulator. These are FeeaSim planning to do in future: Support customized gameplay that player can make route or train package by self. Support model formats like .obj or .b3d. More Language options. Cross-system support (Linux, Mac). Q&A: Q: Why called “FeeaSim”? A: “Feea” is come from “via” in English. Creator think it seems to sound like the train speeding by. And fits the content of the game specially.

item.title: Thanks
item.description: Since NextOct Studio was founded, we get many support from those friends who with same hobbies: Those friends who with railway hobbies. ECMSC - Tyex. Strangers on the Internet.
